short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cobrowse any website with your teammates!
short.es: ¡Navega por cualquier sitio web con tus compañeras de equipo!
short.zh_CN: 和队友一起讨论文档，写作业，看视频！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vera - YouTube Watch Party enables friends or long-distance couples to enjoy watching videos together! Here are our key features:

- Video sync switch
- Audio/video
- Background remover
- Invite more friends during a watch party

Hope our product can bring your distant friends closer in this time of social distancing--leave us a review and we will improve the product according to your feedbacks.
long.es,zh_CN: Vera co-browsing makes it possible for you to co-browse any website with your friend--to work on a google doc, to watch a video together--your browser is directly connected to your friend's browser with webRTC, and feel free to chat as long as you want!
